snippet: Two former aides to the New Jersey governor have again refused to provide material sought by a legislative panel investigating the lane closings leading to the George Washington Bridge.
abstract: Bill Stepien and Bridget Anne Kelly, former aides to New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, have again refused to provide material sought by legislative panel investigating the lane closings on the George Washington Bridge; rejection of subpoena sets up a likely court battle.
lead_paragraph: Two former aides to the New Jersey governor have again refused to provide material sought by a legislative panel investigating the lane closings leading to the George Washington Bridge.

headline.main: Former Aides to Christie Again Reject a Subpoena
headline.print_headline: Former Aides to Christie Again Reject a Subpoena

keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
